thig3.2:1.2: I came out from the dwelling place.
thig3.2:1.3: I had not attained peace of mind,
thig3.2:1.4: had no power over the mind.
thig3.2:2.3: She expounded the Dhamma to me,
thig3.2:2.4: the aggregates, elements, and sense domains.
thig3.2:3.2: in the way she instructed me,
thig3.2:3.3: I sat down crossed legged for one week,
